head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SACHS, BENJAMIN K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SACHS, BENJAMIN K.

block.p: SACHS-Benjamin K. On August 16, 2000. Beloved husband of Ethel; devoted father of David, Leslie and Lawrence; father-in-law of Karen and Robert. Adored grandfather of Rachel, Sam, Eli, Shmuel, Moshe, Dovid and Esther. He will be missed by all. Funeral Friday at 9:45 am, Gutterman's, 8000 Jericho Tpk, Woodbury, NY, 516-921-5757. Shiva will be observed at home.
